attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I would like to give support to Joanna Lumley to let all the Gurkhas to stay in this country some have given there lives to this country and suffered horrendous injuries unlike those that come in the back of a lorry just to get all the benifits this country chucks at them even rapists murderers and drug dealers and we can not even deport them as it would infringe there human rights so what

rejection.details:
Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement. 
It also overlaps or duplicates the following petition http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/justice4gurkhas/
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
